about_the_game:
• Bottom of the Well "is a text-based adventure galgame that was launched in March 2024, with the theme of" superpowered suspenseful detective stories "and a Japanese campus style art style

  • The game adopts the gameplay of AVG visual novels, where players can advance the plot progress by clicking the mouse to play the game content. The game has a text volume of about 200000 words and has a dual line ending. Players can experience the desired game ending by selecting the corresponding branch events

  • The story mainly tells the story of the female protagonist Wang Yuyi, as an amateur "detective", encountering various difficult problems and solving the case with the help of the detective agency director Tianxiang and his sister Tianyin.

  • Role introduction:

    Wang Yuyi:

    The girl who ran away from home because of her longing and desire to become a private detective was rescued by the male lead on June 1st when she spent money recklessly and had to sleep on the streets before taking action. I don't like being played with my name

    Tianyin:

    Teacher Tianxiang's assistant is actually his younger sister, but the slow witted Wang Yuyi has never noticed that she has a gentle and obedient personality, and is also good at grasping small details. Perhaps she is a bit cunning?

    Tianxiang:

    The director of Tianxiang Detective Agency, sharp and capable, seems to have some favoritism towards his younger sister.

    He's a damn dyed yellow hair (Wang Yuyi said so)

  • STAFF

Disclaimer: All characters in this game are over 18 years old at the time of the plot.

short_description: 《井底》是一款2024年3月立项的文字类galgame，题材是“超能力悬疑推理故事”，画风是日系校园风格的 故事主要讲述了游戏女主王语韴作为一个业余“侦探”，遇到各种疑难问题，并在侦探事务所所长天翔及其妹妹天音的帮助下，解决案件的故事。 游戏主要使用鼠标点击来推进剧情
